title: Judy Blue Women's Mid Rise Tummy Control Straight Jeans, Stretch Denim Comfort Fit for Everyday Wear - 88861
description: Premium Fabric Blend for Comfort and Durability: These jeans are made from a high-quality blend of 91% cotton, 7% polyester, and 2% spandex, offering a soft and comfortable feel while ensuring long-lasting durability and flexibility for everyday wear.

Tummy Control for a Flattering Fit: Designed with a built-in tummy control panel, these jeans provide a slimming effect that enhances your natural shape, giving you a confident and flattering silhouette every time you wear them.

Stylish Mid Rise Straight Jeans: Featuring a trendy mid-rise fit, these jeans sit comfortably on your waist, while the destroyed and cropped detailing adds a modern, edgy look perfect for casual outings or dressed-up occasions.

Stretch Denim for Maximum Comfort: The stretch denim fabric offers excellent elasticity, allowing for unrestricted movement and a comfortable fit that adapts to your body's shape, making these jeans ideal for all-day wear.

Classic Straight Leg Cut for Versatile Styling: With a classic straight leg design, these jeans provide a timeless look that pairs effortlessly with various tops and footwear, making them a versatile addition to your wardrobe for any season or style preference.

Experience the superior comfort of stretch denim that moves with you, providing maximum comfort and ease of movement throughout the day. Crafted from a blend of 91% Cotton, 7% Polyester, and 2% Spandex, these jeans offer a perfect balance of durability, stretch, and softness. The mid-rise fit ensures that these jeans sit comfortably on your waist, making them suitable for various body types and perfect for everyday wear. The look adds a trendy, edgy vibe to your outfit, allowing you to effortlessly transition from casual outings to more dressed-up occasions. The classic straight leg cut offers a timeless style that pairs well with a wide range of tops and footwear, making these jeans a versatile addition to your wardrobe.
